projects.name: PD Temperature Controller

Designed electrical circuit and built testbench temperature chamber alongside a graphical interface to analyze PD controller performance

projects.name: FSM Controller Rollercoaster
highlights: Developed a finite state machine controller that manages model rollercoaster carts through the track
Designed sensing and actuating system/circuit on Eagle for model rollercoaster

projects.name: ArgoCD AppSource Controller

Supports multiple ArgoCD Project "profiles" that limit what actions sub-users can make with their application.
Currently going through adoption proccess for the argo-proj-labs collection of vetted community projects

projects.name: UART and I2C Controller
highlights: Used Memory Mapped I/O (MMIO) to build UART and I2C peripheral drivers
Built an acoustic "clap" detector that runs on the STM32 Nucleo Board using I2C for acoustic data and UART to print sensor data to the console

projects.name: Real Time Kernel
highlights: Designed and built my own multi-threaded Real Time Operating System (RTOS) with context switching, mutexes, and enforced fixed priority scheduling.

projects.name: Malloc
highlights: Implemented my own dynamic memory allocation library in C using both explicit and segregated free lists

projects.name: Unix Tiny Shell
highlights: Developed my own Unix commmand line shell program with support for foreground and background job control using parent/child process control and signal handlers
